text: Dayutʹ harna novyna tsym khto vvazhayutʹ ta pryzvodyatʹ spravedlyvi dovichni shcho vony budutʹ maty park z techuchymy potokamy. Koly zabezpechenyy zabezpechennyam fruktiv tam, vony skazhutʹ, "Tse shcho vkhodylo do kompetentsiyi yakshcho dlya nas ranishe." Otzhe, vony dayutʹsya alehorychni opys. Vony budutʹ maty chyste podruzhzhya tam, ta vony perebuyutʹ tam zavzhdy
